text: @NYGovCuomo Wake up @NYGovCuomo Demblasio is destroying a once upon greatest and safest city in the once upon the greatest state which is now your state,  don't worry about Covid19 let God handle that, but God wants you to handle your state and put someone that can take charge of the city
